LanguageData.VQEA_Levitation.label: levitation
LanguageData.VQEA_Levitation.description: Use a delicate psychic field to levitate to the target location.
LanguageData.VQEA_Levitation.verbProperties.label: levitation
LanguageData.VQEA_Invisibility.label: invisibility
LanguageData.VQEA_Invisibility.description: Use psychic suggestion to turn yourself invisible for a short duration.
LanguageData.VQEA_InfernoSpew.label: inferno spew
LanguageData.VQEA_InfernoSpew.description: Expel a dense jet of sticky, flammable bile from the mouth. Upon contact, it can ignite targets and leave behind burning puddles on the ground. The bile is produced and stored in a specialized gland in the neck, paired with a separate chamber containing a hypergolic compound used for ignition.
LanguageData.VQEA_HellsphereBlast.label: hellsphere blast
LanguageData.VQEA_HellsphereBlast.description: Unleash a concentrated beam of destructive energy from the eyes, identical to the blast fired by a hellsphere cannon. After a short duration, the microscoping skipgates in the eyes release a searing pulse of power capable of melting concrete and incinerating anything within the blast zone.
LanguageData.VQEA_EMPPulse.label: electromagnetic pulse
LanguageData.VQEA_EMPPulse.description: Release a powerful electromagnetic pulse, damaging all electronics in radius. If used outside, lightning strikes may hit the area around the caster.
LanguageData.VQEA_MatterPhasing.label: matter phasing
LanguageData.VQEA_MatterPhasing.description: The colonist briefly shifts into an intangible state, letting them pass through walls before becoming solid again.
